title: Link to the FOAM Map
body: Provide the ability for an Aavagotchi to link to the FOAM map. Since the FOAM map has locations and is a token curated registry system to keep the locations accurate over time. The linkage will  build the infrastructure to allow - treasure hunts, scavenger hunts and other location based games.
author: 0xE2d128323Cf7560a6E7a82726D7b425aEdc7a556
